utterance.speaker: Photographer
utterance.content: Great. Great! Just give me a sec to change film.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I know I’m not supposed to know, but I do. And I’m so excited for you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica’s pregnant!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! Is that why you guys had to get married?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys! I’m not pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah. Slow swimmers?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! What do you mean? You-you-you’re not pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You didn’t tell anybody I was did you?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! I’ll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Photographer
utterance.content: Now why don’t we get a shot of just Monica and the bloody soldier.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, about that. Joey, you have to change before the party.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can’t! I-I don’t have any other clothes here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Find some! Please! Anything that doesn’t say I-I died tragically in France.

utterance.speaker: Photographer
utterance.content: Well then why don’t we see the bride and the groom and the bridemaids.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Hey Mon, why did you tell the guys you weren’t pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because I’m not.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We found your test in the trash, if you’re not pregnant——It’s because I am.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?! What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, I…I am with child. And I didn’t want to say anything because it’s your day; I didn’t want to steal your thunder.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute! So you told people I was pregnant?! Does this look like a conversation that I want to remember?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who’s the father?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t say.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t say because he’s famous.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, who is it?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, come on, you have to tell us.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, okay. It’s James Brolin. James Brolin is the father of my baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: As in Barbara Streisand’s husband James Brolin?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! Well he never said that to me!

utterance.speaker: Photographer
utterance.content: Why don’t we have Monica step away and we’ll get Chandler and the bridemaids.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How about just the bridemaids?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know I am the groom right? I was told it was kinda big deal.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It is.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: For you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thank you for doing that. I just can’t deal with this just quite yet.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So instead you told me Monica was pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You said that she was, I just didn’t disagree with you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sneaky.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Photographer
utterance.content: Smile ladies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh by the way?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: James Brolin?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I know. I could only think of two names, him and Ed Begley Jr. and then I remembered he’s gay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ed Begley Jr. is not gay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Bandleader
utterance.content: Thank you very much! Ladies and gentlemen, it gives me great pleasure to introduce to you for the very first time, Mr. and Mrs. Chandler Bing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Before we go out there I’ve got a present for ya.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, I’m going to put my hand in your pocket!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’ve been taking dancing lessons.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, the last six weeks. I wanted this to be a moment you will never forget.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that is so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So? Would you care to join me in our first dance as husband and wife?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know, it’s these new shoes, they’re all slippery.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, are you going to be able to do this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not well.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, the good news is, I don’t think anyone’s looking at us.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, are you ready to talk about it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, we’ll talk about something else then.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who’s the father?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! Look honey y’know what? I haven’t told him yet, so until I do I don’t think I should tell anybody else.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. That’s fine. That’s fair. Is it Tag?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I’m sorry. I’ll stop.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is it Ross? It’s Ross isn’t it—Oh my God, it’s Joey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, stop it! I am not going to tell you until I tell him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ah-hah! At least we know it’s a him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh sweet Lord.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sorry! Okay? I went down to the gift shop and it’s either this or a bathrobe! Look, what’s more important, the way I’m dressed or me being with you on your special day?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, I’m not even going to pretend I was listening. Hey! Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi. I’m uh, I’m Ross. I don’t, I don’t believe we’ve met. I’m Monica’s older brother.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Oh hi, I’m, I’m Mona from her restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! Hello uh, Mona from her restaurant. Mona, wow what a, what a beautiful name.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: You think so? I’ve always kinda hated it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Aw come on, Mona Lisa?

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mona umm…Clickclocken. The famous botanist? Huh? Oh no she’s uh—well she’s dead now. No, supposedly she was once quite the hottie of the plant world.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Really?! Well see? I never knew about her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Linda Clickclocken. So what uh, what-what table are you at? Oh, uh me too.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Oh good. Now there’ll be someone there who likes my name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes there will. Oh guess what, Molly Gilbert you’ve just been bumped up to table one. And if it’s all right with you I’m gonna take your place at table six—Martin Clickclocken.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s better, now just bend your arms a little more. There you go. Okay, look straight ahead. Now this time I want you to really put your ass into it.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Chandler darling! Look, my date has finally arrived. I’d like you to meet Dennis Phillips.

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Congratulations.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Dennis is a dear old friend and a fantastic lover.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bravo Dennis thanks for pleasing my mother so.

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Oh, I’m so sorry I missed the ceremony, I was stuck at auditions.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Oh yes, Dennis is directing a new Broadway show.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t believe we’ve met, Joey Tribbiani.

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Dennis Phillips

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, I’ve admired your work for years. You-you’ve done some really amazing stuff.

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Oh, thank you. Well if you’ll excuse me, I’m gonna go get myself a drink. Be back in a moment.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow Dennis Phillips! That’s great! How did you guys meet?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Bing
utterance.content: Well, it’s a funny story.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Funny: ha-ha or funny:

utterance.speaker: Bandleader
utterance.content: Thank you, thank you very much. If everyone will please take your seats, dinner will be served.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Uh, I thought, I thought you were at table six.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: No, nine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh see, before you uh, when you showed it to me you-you held it that way which uh, which was misleading. Well I’m… Hello.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler. Will you see if your mom can give my resume to Dennis Phillips? ‘Cause if I can get in a Broadway show then I would’ve done it all, film, television, and theater. The only think left would be radio, and that’s just for ugly people.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What size shoes do you wear?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, eleven, eleven and a half.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great, because my shoes are giving me a little problem on the dance floor, can I borrow the boots from your costume?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, I don’t even really know where I left those. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Those aren’t eleven and a half.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay fine! I’m a seven! All right, I have surprisingly small feet. But the rest of me is good, I’ll show ya!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can you believe Phoebe got pregnant?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh y’know what honey? Let’s not talk about that right now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is so huge.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure, but come on, as big as your wedding?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course not nothing is. Between me and you…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: …in this day and age how dumb do you have to be to get pregnant?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Y’know, sometimes you can do everything right, everyone can wear everything they’re supposed to wear, and one of those little guys just gets through!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know! Maybe they have tools.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well I-I talked to and uh, she’s definitely going to have this baby. Y’know, she said she was gonna raise it on her own.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, maybe that’s, maybe that’s really brave.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe. I just hope she realizes how hard it’s gonna be.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Maybe she hasn’t really thought it through that well.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, there’s a lot to think about. I mean, how is she, how is she going to handle this financially? How is she going to juggle work? Does she realize she’s not going to have a date again for the next eighteen years?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-hmm. I’m just thinking about Phoebe; poor knocked up Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Champagne?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yes! Thank you very much! Oh that’s-that’s actually how the French drink it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I just got off the phone with my lover, James Brolin…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, and apparently he is married to some singer, but he said he would leave her for me. And I said, "James, James Brolin, are you sure?" James Brolin said…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel’s really the one who’s pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! Why bother?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How do you feel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know. I don’t know how I feel. This is all happening so fast. I have to make all these decisions that I don’t want to make. Somebody just take this away from me!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Calm down. Maybe you’re not pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: When I got pregnant with the triplets, I took that test like three times just to make sure.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! Maybe it’s a false positive. Are you sure you peed on the stick right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How many ways are there to do that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m-I’m just saying, don’t freak out until you’re a hundred percent sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I’ll-I’ll take it again when I get home.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You-you gotta take it now. Come on, do it as a present to me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’ll run out and get you one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, you guys are so great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, wait a minute! Who’s is the father?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, she won’t tell us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, come on it’s my wedding! That can be my present.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wh—Hey, I just gave you peeing on a stick.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See? This is why you register.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was the chair again! Okay? I’m not doing it! It what—look, I don’t—y’know what—eh-eh… Hi.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, would you like to dance?

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Dr. Geller?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wasn’t farting! Uh, a little game from our table. Yes?

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Dr. Geller, will you dance with me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh umm, well uh, maybe-maybe later. Right now, I’m about to dance with this lady.

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Ohhhh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, unless! Unless, uh this lady wouldn’t mind letting you go first.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: I’d be happy to. You are very sweet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes I-I am. In fact umm hey, why don’t we try it my special way? You can dance on my feet.

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? Hop on. Is the pretty lady looking?

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Keep dancing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And the world will never know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Did you talk to Dennis about me yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, I told him how talented you were. I told him all about Days Of Our Lives.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no! No! No! You don’t tell a Broadway guy that! Now he just thinks I’m a soap actor.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But you’re not just a soap actor. You are a soap actor with freakishly tiny feet.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no, thank you Miranda.

utterance.speaker: Little Girl
utterance.content: Melinda!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: How cute was that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh, were you, were you watching?

utterance.speaker: Second Girl
utterance.content: Can I go next?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Of course you can! Hop on!

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Okay, but I get to hop on after her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am so gonna score.

utterance.speaker: Second Girl
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I like your bow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’d like to propose a toast. To Monica and Chandler, the greatest couple in the world. And my best friends. Now, my when I first found out they were getting married I was, I was a little angry. I was like, "Why God? Why? How can you take them away from me?!" But then I thought back over all our memories together, some happy memories. And-and there was some sad memories. I’m sorry. And-and some scared memories—Whoa! Eh? And then, and then I realized I’ll always be their friend, their friend who can speak in many dialects and has training in stage combat and is willing to do partial nudity. Oh! To the happy couple!

utterance.speaker: Bandleader
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That was very nice Ashley.

utterance.speaker: Ashley
utterance.content: Can we do it again?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: So, is it my turn now?

utterance.speaker: Fat Girl
utterance.content: I’m next!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: Uh, that’s okay. You can dance with her first.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, you-you sure? Okay. Okay. So what’s uh, what’s your name.

utterance.speaker: Fat Girl
utterance.content: Gert!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s, that’s pretty. Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What are you doing there Gert?

utterance.speaker: Gert
utterance.content: Dancing on your feet! Like the other girls did it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Hop on Gert.

utterance.speaker: Gert
utterance.content: Why aren’t you moving your feet?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m trying.

utterance.speaker: Gert
utterance.content: Faster! You’re not going fast enough!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe I should stand on your feet!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So did you uh, happen to catch my toast up there?

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Oh my God, that was for my benefit?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I’d like to think there was something for everyone. Look, I know you’re casting for this new show…

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Look umm Joey, I-I don’t think you’re quite right for this project.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, see that’s where you’re wrong. Whatever it is I can do it. And if didn’t see it up there, just-just try me.

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: It’s an all Chinese cast. Can you be Chinese?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well I’m not proud of this, but…

utterance.speaker: Dennis Phillips
utterance.content: Oh my God! No-no-no! Please! Please! Don’t-don’t-don’t!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, are you ready to get back on the dance floor?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did it turn into sand?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh come on, I love this song! Come on, you’ll be fine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No, I won’t. Do you know why I took all those lessons? See, for the first time I didn’t want you to be embarrassed to be seen on the dance floor with some clumsy idiot.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh sweetie, you can never embarrass me. Okay, you can easily embarrass me. But come on, it doesn’t matter. All right? I married you! So I want to dance on my wedding night with my husband. Come on. Just try not to move your feet at all. There you go.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Chandler, I’m gonna have you arrested.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: You stole my moves.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How much longer?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: 30 seconds.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: 30 seconds, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did I miss it? Rachel, I-I want you to know that, if it’s positive, we’re gonna…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh I know. I know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s time.

utterance.speaker: The Girls
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Go ahead Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wait! Y’know what? I can’t, I can’t look at it. I can’t. Somebody else tell me, somebody tell me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, it’s negative.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s negative.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Oh. Well there you go. Whew! That is—that’s great—that is really great-great news. Y’know ‘cause the whole not being ready and kinda the financial aspects, all that. Whew. Wow, this is so just the way it was supposed to be. God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well… Well, great.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks. God this is so stupid! How could I be upset over something I never had? It’s negative?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, it’s positive.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s-it’s not negative, it’s positive.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well yeah, I lied before.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now you know how you really feel about it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh, that’s a risky little game!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you really gonna do this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. I’m gonna have a baby. I’m gonna have a baby. I’m gonna have a baby!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: With who?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, it’s still not the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just didn’t see the fast song coming.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Shh. Shh. Don’t try to talk, we’ll get you up to your room, we’ll soak your feet, you’ll be okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: That is so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: No, I mean it. There are so few genuinely nice guys out there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Tell me about it, I feel like I’m holding down the fort all by myself.

utterance.speaker: Mona
utterance.content: It’s Joey right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute! No! I’m the nice one! I’m the one who danced with the kids all night! How…How small are your feet?!
